title: Friend's list gone.
body: Got up to play this morning and my friends list was still visible. I came back about a half an hour later and all my friends are gone, across multiple accounts. Is anyone else experiencing this same issue? When i attempt to add someone it says "Internal server error, please try again later"

replies.body: Noticing the same thing right this moment.
Had the same issue. I just signed out instead of closing the client and logged back in and its back to normal for me

Whereas I never had a friends list to begin with
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
The client is just garbage, this is standard procedure considering what has recently been happening.
Mine is fine. Have you tried to do a repair? or Restart? I have had something similar before but that was the transition into beta. I'm sure it's just temporary.
legit same, its so fucking annoying, feels like every week the client is fucked :(
